charges.charge_description: 18:13-7210.M TRAFFIC OFFENSES, DRUNKEN DRIVING - Title 18 U.S.C. Section 13  (Involving Section 49.04(d) T.P.C.) - Driving While Intoxicated at JBSA-Fort Sam Houston, Texas(1)

charges.charge_disposition: SECOND REVOCATION SENTENCE: Defendant is remanded to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prison (BOP) for THIRTY (30) DAYS of imprisonment with credit for time served during this pending revocation; with no supervised release to follow. Any monetary sanctions imposed in this case that remain unpaid are due and payable immediately. FIRST REVOCATION SENTENCE: Defendant's probation is continued for an additional SIX (6) months. ORIGINAL SENTENCE: TWELVE (12) MONTHS supervised probation with special conditions; no fine; $25.00 special assessment
